Reviews.Title: Great camera, can't believe the awesome price.
Reviews.Author: Evelyn M. Wasik
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use, great photos, the price and all the stuff you get with it is unbelievable!!

Reviews.Title: This is a great package.
Reviews.Author: JOHN  LEWIS
Reviews.Content: This is a great lightweight camera to use for travel and has a great Zoom that takes clear distance closeup photos without having to carry extra lenses.

Reviews.Title: Good bargain
Reviews.Author: rmat
Reviews.Content: The sx500 is easy to use and I have been pleased with the quality of pictures and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Not quite an SLR but well worth it with this package deal
Reviews.Author: J. E. Ramski "DOC Jim R"
Reviews.Content: This camera was selected after a full month of comparing as my wife wanted to buy me exactly what I wanted to replace my old 35mm Minolta SLR with a digital upgrade.. The SLRs were just a bit pricey right now as we are getting married but this was just the ticket. Terrific Deal on an awesome selection of add-ons combined into 1 deal

Reviews.Title: Great product received really fast
Reviews.Author: Jeremy M. Horn
Reviews.Content: I was shopping for a good camera for a Christmas present and I decided on this one; especially because of the bundle.  And it arrived so fast. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Here's to many shots.
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: Ease of use of the camera and the ordering process was very user friendly.  The camera arrived right on schedule.

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP CCD Sensor
DIGIC 4 Image Processor
24mm Wide Angle Lens w/ 30x Optical Zoom
3.0" LCD Display with 461,000 Dots
720p HD Video with Dedicated Button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS Digital Camera 32GB Package 3
